name: rgb-mcp-server
description: MCP server for RGB API JS SDK integration

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run minify
scripts.minify: terser dist/index.js -c -m -o dist/index.min.js && terser dist/server.js -c -m -o dist/server.min.js && terser dist/rgb-client.js -c -m -o dist/rgb-client.min.js && terser dist/types.js -c -m -o dist/types.min.js && rm dist/index.js dist/server.js dist/rgb-client.js dist/types.js && mv dist/index.min.js dist/index.js && mv dist/server.min.js dist/server.js && mv dist/rgb-client.min.js dist/rgb-client.js && mv dist/types.min.js dist/types.js
